title: Ep. 109: ‘The OA’, ‘La La Land’, and ‘20th Century Women’
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald remember Carrie Fisher and George Michael (3:27). They also discuss the new Netflix drama ‘The OA’ (12:42) and awards season (27:05), including the films ‘La La Land’ (29:30) and ‘20th Century Women’ (38:40).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
